channel.title: Whonix No internet connection
channel.description:
Hello folks, first thing that I want to tell - whonix is awesome. Secondary, I crashed my PC somehow and when I try to open [http://www.theverge.com/](http://www.theverge.com/) [http://www.foxnews.com](http://www.foxnews.com) [https://www.58lotto.com/](https://www.58lotto.com/) [http://www.billboard.com/](http://www.billboard.com/) [http://www.latimes.com/](http://www.latimes.com/)
It says - "no internet connection" but I have one, my skype works fine for example. What have I done?

item.title: Whonix No internet connection
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Welcome! Please be as precise as possible. We are running 3 operating systems at once so it’s easy to have misunderstandings.

Are you trying to visit the websites using Whonix-Workstation? Is Skype also installed on your Workstation? or on your host?

Similar to this? No Internet Connection

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix No internet connection
item.dc:creator: Raymond_Casey
item.description:
Hello folks, first thing that I want to tell - whonix is awesome. Secondary, I crashed my PC somehow and when I try to open
http://www.theverge.com/
http://www.foxnews.com
https://www.58lotto.com/
http://www.billboard.com/
http://www.latimes.com/

It says - “no internet connection” but I have one, my skype works fine for example. What have I done?
